Package org.jlab.jlog

Class CommentAdminExtension

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.jlog.CommentAdminExtension
public class CommentAdminExtension extends Object
Wraps a Comment to provide administrative capabilities. Generally these features will only be needed on the server for administrator use.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CommentAdminExtension(Comment comment)
    Construct a new CommentAdminExtension for the specified Comment.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommentAdminExtension

      public CommentAdminExtension(Comment comment)
      Construct a new CommentAdminExtension for the specified Comment.
      Parameters:
      comment - The Comment

  • Method Details

    • setAuthor

      public void setAuthor(String author) throws LogRuntimeException
      Set the author username. Note: the author username is automatically initialized to the submitter (program user). The server will ignore values that do not match the submitter unless the submitter is an administrator.
      Parameters:
      author - The author username
      Throws:
      LogRuntimeException - If unable to set the author username

    • setCreated

      public void setCreated(GregorianCalendar created) throws LogRuntimeException
      Set the created date/time. Note: the created date/time is automatically initialized to the date/time at which the LogEntry object is instantiated.
      Parameters:
      created - The created date/time.
      Throws:
      LogRuntimeException - If unable to set the created date/time.

    • setLogNumber

      public void setLogNumber(long lognumber) throws LogRuntimeException
      Set the log number. This method provides a way to revise a LogEntry without loading its original field values from the server first.
      Parameters:
      lognumber - The log number
      Throws:
      LogRuntimeException - If unable to set the log number
